com.fangcloud.sdk.auth

Class YfyAuthFinish

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fangcloud.sdk.auth.YfyAuthFinish

  • public final class YfyAuthFinish
extends Object
    When you successfully complete the authorization process, the Fangcloud server returns detailed user access information to you.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YfyAuthFinish() 
      YfyAuthFinish(String accessToken, String refreshToken, long expiresIn, String tokenType, String scope) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAccessToken()
      Returns an access token that can be used to make Fangcloud API calls.
      long getExpiresIn()
      Returns the expire time which access token is valid in this time
      String getRefreshToken()
      Returns refresh token that can be used to refresh access token and itself.Usually use when access token is expired.
      String getScope()
      authorization scope, only "all" now
      String getTokenType()
      token type, must be "bearer" now
      void setAccessToken(String accessToken) 
      void setExpiresIn(long expiresIn) 
      void setRefreshToken(String refreshToken) 
      void setScope(String scope) 
      void setTokenType(String tokenType)

        Parameters:
        accessToken - OAuth access token

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        public String getAccessToken()
        Returns an access token that can be used to make Fangcloud API calls. Pass this in to the YfyClient constructor.

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(String accessToken)

      • getRefreshToken

        public String getRefreshToken()
        Returns refresh token that can be used to refresh access token and itself.Usually use when access token is expired. Pass this in to the YfyClient constructor.

      • setRefreshToken

        public void setRefreshToken(String refreshToken)

      • getExpiresIn

        public long getExpiresIn()
        Returns the expire time which access token is valid in this time

      • setExpiresIn

        public void setExpiresIn(long expiresIn)

      • getTokenType

        public String getTokenType()
        token type, must be "bearer" now

      • setTokenType

        public void setTokenType(String tokenType)

      • getScope

        public String getScope()
        authorization scope, only "all" now

      • setScope

        public void setScope(String scope)
